mapper.insert: insert into gg_sswpxx (ID, DATA_FLAG, LRR_SFZH, LRSJ, XGR_SFZH, XGSJ, BAQID, BAQMC, WPBH, CLLX, LX, MC, LB, CYR, DW, SL, TZ, JZ, CFWZ, TXM, BZ, WPZT, ZBR_XM, ZBR_SFZH, ZBDW_BH, TBSJ, RKSJ, CKSJ, RKMJ_SFZH, RKMJ_XM, CKMJ_SFZH, CKMJ_XM,RYBH,WJID, EWM ,DWXTBH,SFZNBAQ,WPCLZT,YJDH,YJZPID) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{lrrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{xgrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{baqid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{baqmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wpbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cllx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cyr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jz,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cfwz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{txm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wpzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zbrXm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zbrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zbdwBh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rksj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cksj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rkmjSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rkmjXm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ckmjSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ckmjXm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wjid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ewm,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY}, #{dwxtbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sfznbaq,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{wpclzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yjdh,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{yjzpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update gg_sswpxx set ISDEL = #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DATA_FLAG = #{dataflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, LRR_SFZH = #{lrrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XGR_SFZH = #{xgrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XGSJ = date_trunc('second', now()), BAQID = #{baqid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BAQMC = #{baqmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WPBH = #{wpbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLLX = #{cllx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LX = #{lx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MC = #{mc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LB = #{lb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CYR = #{cyr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DW = #{dw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SL = #{sl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TZ = #{tz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JZ = #{jz,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CFWZ = #{cfwz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TXM = #{txm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BZ = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WPZT = #{wpzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZBR_XM = #{zbrXm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZBR_SFZH = #{zbrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZBDW_BH = #{zbdwBh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TBSJ = #{tbsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RKSJ = #{rksj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CKSJ = #{cksj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RKMJ_SFZH = #{rkmjSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RKMJ_XM = #{rkmjXm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CKMJ_SFZH = #{ckmjSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CKMJ_XM = #{ckmjXm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RYBH = #{rybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WJID = #{wjid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EWM = #{ewm,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY}, DWXTBH = #{dwxtbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SFZNBAQ = #{sfznbaq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, WPCLZT = #{wpclzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YJDH = #{yjdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YJZPID = #{yjzpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select * from gg_sswpxx
1=1 and isdel = 0
and BAQID = '${baqid}'
and WPZT = '${wpzt}'
and WPBH = '${wpbh}'
and MC LIKE '%${mc}%'
and CYR LIKE '%${cyr}%'
and RYBH = '${rybh}'
and DWXTBH = '${zbdwBh}'
and ZBR_SFZH = '${zbrSfzh}'
and WPZT = '${wpztRadio}'
and WPCLZT = '${wpclzt}'
and YJDH = '${yjdh}'
and WPZT in
'${item}'
and rybh in
'${item}'
and DWXTBH LIKE CONCAT(left(#{orgSysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},2),'%')
and DWXTBH LIKE CONCAT(left(#{orgSysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},4),'%')
and DWXTBH LIKE CONCAT(left(#{orgSysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},6),'%')
and DWXTBH LIKE CONCAT(left(#{orgSysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},8),'%')
and LRR_SFZH = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and LB != '03'
and LB = '03'
